* Diana laughed as she saw Rion fall over the bank, but trotted down just to 
make sure that he was alright. She didn't want her best friend hurt.
She squatted down and smiled at him, her whiskers twitching with delight and 
her paws reached down to brush away some of the sand that was around his 
face.*

" Digging for gold?"

* She snickerd to herself before sitting back, waiting for her friend to get 
up so that they could continue on their way.*
